text: z The site is in multiple ownership, and landowners and developers should work together to develop a comprehensive design-led masterplan for redevelopment of this site, to ensure development is |Site information|Details| ||| |Address|Leamouth Road/Lanrick Road| |Area [ha]|5.10| |Ward|Poplar/Blackwall and Cubitt Town| |PTAL [2031]|1b-5| |Planning designations|z Area of substandard air quality z Flood risk area z Site of Importance for Nature Conservation (River Thames and Tidal Tributaries, and Bow Creek Ecology Park, both adjacent to the site) z Local Industrial Location (Blackwall Trading Estate) z Archaeological Priority Area (Lea Valley, Tier 3; and Limmo, Tier 2) z Tall Building Zone (Leamouth) z Statutory listed buildings (Entrance Gateway, grade II; and East India Dock Wall and Gateway, grade II; both adjacent to the site)| |Relevant Permissions|None|
